item.title: Npc talking help
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Lol you’re all terrible at Java XD

You’re putting a case within another case. It’s only setting the break for one… If I remember correctly. Oh wait no, it shouldn’t work like that… FML. I forgot.

Try putting a break; above “case 118:”.

item.title: Npc talking help
item.dc:creator: @combat_evil1 combat evil1
item.description:
@combat_evil1 wrote:

void UpdateNPCChat() { case 118: { talk("'Ello, and what are you after then?", 1597); break; } case 119: talk("I have a wide selection of Slayer equipment; take a look!", 1597); break; case 120: talk2("You're only assigned to kill", ""+GetNpcName(taskID)+"; only "+taskAmount+" more to go.", 1597); break; case 121: talk("My name's Vannaka; I'm a Slayer Master.", 1597); break; case 122: talk2("You'll find me in Edgeville. I'll be here when you need", "a new task.", 1597); break; case 123: talk2("You do not have a task.", "Talk to me in Edgeville when you get one.", 1597); break; server.Dialogue.sendDialogue(this, NpcDialogue); }

Read full topic

item.title: Npc talking help
item.dc:creator: @jman7 jman7
item.description:
@jman7 wrote:

lol no, here lemme post this for u

void UpdateNPCChat() {
			case 118:
{
            talk("'Ello, and what are you after then?", 1597);
            break;
}
			case 119:
				talk("I have a wide selection of Slayer equipment; take a look!", 1597);
				break;
			case 120:
				talk2("You're only assigned to kill", ""+GetNpcName(taskID)+"; only "+taskAmount+" more to go.", 1597);
				break;
			case 121:
				talk("My name's Vannaka; I'm a Slayer Master.", 1597);
				break;
			case 122:
				talk2("You'll find me in Edgeville. I'll be here when you need", "a new task.", 1597);
				break;
			case 123:
				talk2("You do not have a task.", "Talk to me in Edgeville when you get one.", 1597);
				break;
			server.Dialogue.sendDialogue(this, NpcDialogue);
	}

Read full topic

item.title: Npc talking help
item.dc:creator: @combat_evil1 combat evil1
item.description:
@combat_evil1 wrote:

//2400,4446

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
	public int[] lowTask = { 87, 100, 19, 1267, 181, 90, 112, 117, 78, 1153 };
	public int[] mediumTask = { 87, 100, 19, 1267, 117, 78, 941, 1338, 912, 913, 914, 2591, 2604, 2610, 1153, 1154 };
	public int[] highTask = { 1627, 181, 90, 112, 117, 78, 1183, 941, 2881, 2882, 2883, 2591, 2604, 2610, 1153, 1154 };
	public int taskID = -1;
	public int taskAmount = -1;

	public int randomLowTask() 
	{
		return lowTask[(int) (Math.random() * lowTask.length)];
	}

	public int randomMediumTask() 
	{
		return mediumTask[(int) (Math.random() * mediumTask.length)];
	}

	public int randomHighTask() 
	{
		return highTask[(int) (Math.random() * highTask.length)];
	}

	public void slayerTalk() 
	{
		interfaceEffect = 3;
		clearQuestInterface();
		sendFrame126("", 2494);
		sendFrame126("I need an assignment", 2495);
		sendFrame126("Do you have anything for trade?", 2496);
		sendFrame126("Er...nothing...", 2497);
		sendFrame126("", 2498);
		sendQuestSomething(8143);
		sendFrame164(2492);
		flushOutStream();
	}

Read full topic

void UpdateNPCChat() {

case 118:

break;
case 119:

break;
case 120:

break;
case 123:
talk2(“You do not have a task.”, “Talk to me in Edgeville when you get one.”, 1597);
break;
server.Dialogue.sendDialogue(this, NpcDialogue);
}
